channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Calling methods is easier and faster with C# 13 params collections】使用 C# 13 参数集合调用方法更加轻松快捷
item.description: 【Let's take a look at C# 13's new params collections that make methods easier to use and allow new optimizations.】让我们看一下 C# 13 的新参数集合，它们使方法更易于使用并允许新的优化。

item.title: 【Nullable Reference Types in F# 9】F# 9 中的可为空引用类型
item.description: 【Read about latest F# 9 feature, Nullable Reference Types】了解最新的 F# 9 功能：可空引用类型

item.title: 【Working with Audio in Semantic Kernel Python】在语义内核 Python 中使用音频
item.description: 【We are pleased to announce the arrival of audio support in Semantic Kernel Python. This new audio functionality will enable you to create more interactive and accessible user experiences. In this blog post, I will detail the new interface, the existing connectors, and provide samples. Please continue reading for more information. Audio-to-Text The first feature […]】我们很高兴地宣布语义内核 Python 现已支持音频。这一新的音频功能将使您能够创建更具交互性和更易于访问的用户体验。在这篇博文中，我将详细介绍新接口、现有连接器，并提供示例。请继续阅读以获取更多信息。音频到文本的第一个功能 [...]

item.title: 【How do I put a non-copyable, non-movable, non-constructible object into a std::optional?】如何将不可复制、不可移动、不可构造的对象放入 std::Optional 中？
item.description: 【Taking advantage of the conversion operator.】利用转换运算符。

item.title: 【Microsoft’s Agentic AI Frameworks: AutoGen and Semantic Kernel】微软的 Agentic AI 框架：AutoGen 和语义内核
item.description: 【Microsoft’s agentic AI frameworks, Semantic Kernel and AutoGen are deeply collaborating to provide the best-in-class agentic developer experience. With Semantic Kernel’s enterprise ready AI capabilities, customers can already use and get support for building agent applications and, moving forward, we’ll align the multi-agent runtime in AutoGen (called autogen-core) with Semantic Kernel, allowing customers to create […]】Microsoft 的代理 AI 框架、Semantic Kernel 和 AutoGen 正在深入合作，以提供一流的代理开发人员体验。借助 Semantic Kernel 的企业级 AI 功能，客户已经可以使用并获得构建代理应用程序的支持，并且展望未来，我们将把 AutoGen 中的多代理运行时（称为 autogen-core）与 Semantic Kernel 保持一致，从而允许客户创建 [ ……]

item.title: 【Allow users to talk and listen to your chatbot using Semantic Kernel Python】允许用户使用语义内核 Python 与您的聊天机器人交谈和聆听
item.description: 【Until now, Semantic Kernel Python only allowed for the development of text-based AI applications. However, this is no longer the case, as we have expanded its capabilities to include audio as one of the supported modalities. In this article, I will provide a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to create a chatbot that can both […]】到目前为止，语义内核 Python 只允许开发基于文本的人工智能应用程序。然而，情况已不再是这样，因为我们已经扩展了其功能，将音频作为支持的模式之一。在本文中，我将提供详细的分步指南，介绍如何创建一个聊天机器人，该机器人可以 [...]

item.title: 【Accessing Private Resources in Azure】访问 Azure 中的私有资源
item.description: 【A practical guide for developers on connecting to Azure resources with private endpoints through a VPN.】为开发人员提供的有关通过 VPN 使用专用终结点连接到 Azure 资源的实用指南。

item.title: 【Join Us at Microsoft Ignite: Unlock GitHub Copilot’s New Potential in Visual Studio】加入 Microsoft Ignite：释放 GitHub Copilot 在 Visual Studio 中的新潜力
item.description: 【Get ready for an exciting Microsoft Ignite breakout session where we’re unveiling the latest advancements in GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio! Join Dalia Abo Sheasha, Jessie Houghton, and Scott Hanselman as they dive into how GitHub Copilot is evolving to help developers work smarter, collaborate better, and achieve more. Here’s a little preview of what […]】准备好参加激动人心的 Microsoft Ignite 分组会议，我们将在 Visual Studio 中揭晓 GitHub Copilot 的最新进展！与 Dalia Abo Sheasha、Jessie Houghton 和 Scott Hanselman 一起深入了解 GitHub Copilot 如何发展以帮助开发人员更智能地工作、更好地协作并取得更多成就。这是一些内容的预览 [...]

item.title: 【How to use GitHub Copilot for Efficient Unit Test Creation】如何使用 GitHub Copilot 高效创建单元测试
item.description: 【As developers, we know that writing comprehensive unit tests is crucial yet often tedious. GitHub Copilot Chat revolutionizes this process by serving as your intelligent testing companion right in your IDE. Let’s explore how to maximize its potential for efficient and thorough test generation. The Testing Challenge: A Common Developer Pain Point Every developer has […]】作为开发人员，我们知道编写全面的单元测试至关重要，但往往很乏味。 GitHub Copilot Chat 在您的 IDE 中充当您的智能测试伴侣，彻底改变了这一过程。让我们探讨如何最大限度地发挥其高效、彻底的测试生成的潜力。测试挑战：常见的开发人员痛点 每个开发人员都有 [...]

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) – November 2024】Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) – 2024 年 11 月
item.description: 【This post announces the November release of the Azure Developer CLI (`azd`).】本文宣布 11 月发布 Azure 开发人员 CLI (`azd`)。
